Preliminary work suggest FM patient benefit MCMB therapy ( Singh et al 1998 ; Creamer et al 1998 ) . This two-arm clinical trial randomize 110 patient either 12 week MCMB intervention 12 week education/attention intervention . The primary aim study 1 ) determine 12 week MCMB intervention improve short term ( i.e . 12 week ) outcomes FM patient compare education/attention control group ; 2 ) determine 12 week MCMB intervention improve long term ( i.e . 24 week ) outcomes FM patient compare education/attention control group . DOC.detailed_description: Fibromyalgia ( FM ) common , complex chronic condition unknown etiology ( Carette 1994 ) . It characterize widespread musculoskeletal pain , multiple tender point , fatigue range symptom ( Wolfe 1990 ) . FM account 15 % rheumatology consultation , prevalence 2 % general population ( 3.4 % female 0.5 % male ) , rise 7 % elderly female ( Wolfe 1995 ) . Disability level social work role , well use medical care , high . Current treatment option often meet limited success . The goal proposal evaluate efficacy multiple component mind-body ( MCMB ) therapy fibromyalgia , short long term outcome . Preliminary work suggest FM patient benefit MCMB therapy ( Singh et al 1998 ; Creamer et al 1998 ) . This two-arm clinical trial randomize 110 patient either 12 week MCMB intervention 12 week education/attention intervention . The primary aim study ( 1 ) determine 12 week MCMB intervention improve short term ( i.e . 12 week ) outcomes FM patient compare education/attention control group ; ( 2 ) determine 12 week MCMB intervention improve long term ( i.e . 24 week ) outcomes FM patient compare education/attention control group . A secondary aim project involve determine patient characteristic ( i.e . disease severity duration , demographic , psychological factor ) associate improvement short long term outcomes well responses MCMB intervention . The primary outcome measure include physical functioning pain measure Fibromyalgia Impact Questionnaire .
